revision.text:
<!--노래_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Song
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 곡명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음악가 | ontologyProperty = artist }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음반 | ontologyProperty = album }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발매일 | ontologyProperty = releaseDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 녹음 | ontologyProperty = recordedIn }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장르 | ontologyProperty = genre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 길이 | ontologyProperty = runtime | unit = minute }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 작사가 | ontologyProperty = writer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 작곡가 | ontologyProperty = composer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 프로듀서 | ontologyProperty = producer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 곡명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전 곡명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전 번호 | ontologyProperty = trackNumber }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이번 곡명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이번 번호 | ontologyProperty = trackNumber }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 다음 곡명 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 다음 번호 | ontologyProperty = trackNumber }}
end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 곡 목록     = 
| 오디오 샘플 = 
-->
